snippet.title: Hexagod - Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Demo
snippet.description:
A minimalist roguelike village builder where you place hexagon tiles, manage resources, and command your villagers.

Developed by Aarimous
Release Date: March 2025 [Early Access]

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #theforeseenarcade #steamnextfest #steamnextfestfebruary2025 #hexagod
